circumstances:
The airplane departed RAF Marham at 2110LT on September 7 on an operation to Berlin. It crash landed at 0430LT in a wheat field at Hall Farm, Barton Bendish, after flying from the Dutch coast with the starboard engine on fire. All six crew members survived. 
Crew:
S/L H. L. Price, pilot, 
Sgt Webber, 
F/S Woodmason, 
Sgt Riley, 
Sgt Giles, 
Sgt Davidson.
